response.original_title: Experiment 42, The Seven Sins  (Maze of Mermaids, Dragons and Guardians)
response.overview: Our characters travel to another dimension, but this one seems more dangerous than what they're used to. One of them seems to be turning into a silver statue, and the only way to save her is to break the curse of the seven sins. To do so, our characters have to encounter and get through attacks from the guardians of the curse. They have to get past deadly mermaids, dragons and a haunted maze without surrendering to any of the seven deadly sins: Lust, Envy, Sloth, Gluttony, Greed, Wrath or Pride or they might turn to stone themselves. Will they make it out?
response.title: Experiment 42, The Seven Sins  (Maze of Mermaids, Dragons and Guardians)
